.. File Bash documentation master file, created by
   sphinx-quickstart on Fri Apr 15 12:06:14 2022.
Welcome to File Bash's documentation!
=====================================

**File Bash** is a simple command line interface application developed and maintained in *The Python Programming Language*. Inspired by the *Linux Terminal* and the *Windows Powershell*, File Bash tries to frame the basic commands coded completely in python *independently*.

Source Code: <https://github.com/Sannidhya127/FIle-Bash>

.. note::

   This project is under active development.
.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
